attributes.action: call for the inclusion in the next Queen’s Speech of proposals for a Constitutional Reform Commission, which is to be charged with setting up fully sovereign Parliaments for the historic nations of England, Scotland and Wales, with all these to be working properly in time for the 800th anniversary, in 2015, of the sealing of Magna Carta in 1215.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
